liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

secondsToWin.label: Seconds to Win
secondsToWin.tooltip: How many seconds after a bid to close the auction.

minIncrement.label: Minimum Bid Increment
minIncrement.tooltip: How much more a bid has to be.

firstWarning.label: Time Remaining of First Warning
firstWarning.tooltip: Seconds remaining when first warning message is displayed.

secondWarning.label: Time Remaining of Second Warning
secondWarning.tooltip: Seconds remaining when second warning message is displayed.

openingMessage.value: /me Bidding for $auction has opened at $bid $currency. You can bid on this auction by using !bid and then the amount you want to bid. Bids must be $increment higher than the previous bid.
openingMessage.label: Opening Message
openingMessage.tooltip:
Message to send when an auction begins.
 $user = Username
 $bid = value of winning bid
 $currency = name of currency
 $increment = minimum bid increment value

auctionInProgressMessage.value: There is an auction for $auction already in progress!
auctionInProgressMessage.label: Auction in Progress Message
auctionInProgressMessage.tooltip:
Message to send when a mod attempts to start an auction while there is already one in progress.
 $auction = name of auction

newBidMessage.value: /me @$user has the high bid at $bid $currency. Do I hear $min?
newBidMessage.label: New Bid Message
newBidMessage.tooltip:
Message to send when a user bids a new winning bid.
 $user = Username
 $bid = value of winning bid
 $currency = name of currency
 $min = minimum bid

insufficientFundsMessage.value: Sorry @$user, you can't afford that bid. NotLikeThis
insufficientFundsMessage.label: Insufficient Funds Message
insufficientFundsMessage.tooltip:
Message to send when a user bids more currency than they have.
 $user = Username

invalidBidMessage.label: Invalid Bid Message
invalidBidMessage.tooltip:
Message to send when a user bids an invalid value, either less than the minimum bid or a non-numeric value.
 min = minimum bid
 $currency = name of currency

firstWarningMessage.label: Going Once Message
firstWarningMessage.tooltip:
Message for first warning.
 $user = Username
 $bid = value of winning bid
 $currency = name of currency

secondWarningMessage.label: Going Twice Message
secondWarningMessage.tooltip:
Message for second warning.
 $user = Username
 $bid = value of winning bid
 $currency = name of currency

winningMessage.label: Winning Message
winningMessage.tooltip:
Message when a user has won the auction.
 $user = Username
 $bid = value of winning bid
 $currency = name of currency
